name: Ultimate Pillow Fighters
description:
A game made in 6 days for the 7th Libgdx game jam! The theme was 'Upside Down'.

Artwork by Raymond "Raeleus" Buckley

Random objects are now flipping upside down across the world. This phenomenon can only be stopped by flipping the objects back to their correct orientation. Experts speculate that if you fail to flip things back, they'll stay that way forever.
